body.name: Essex 3 Drawer Dresser with Interlocking Drawers, Bianca White/Natural
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 5 hrs 22 mins
features: VERSATILE STORAGE: This dresser features 3 drawers for plenty of storage space | Modern design features natural, angled feet | To convert your dresser into a convenient changing table purchase the Delta Children #W100810 Topper (sold separately)

GREENGUARD GOLD CERTIFIED: This dresser meets the most stringent chemical emissions standards to create a healthier home for your child. Tested for more than 10,000 chemicals and VOCs, this dresser is certified to contribute to cleaner indoor air

SAFE OPTION: Interlocking drawer system limits the number of drawers that can be opened at one time | Tested to meet the current requirements of ASTM F2057, the mandatory CPSC safety standard that protects children from tip-over incidents

QUALITY MATERIAL: Made of sustainable woods like New Zealand pine and TSCA compliant engineered wood | Tested for lead and other toxic elements to meet or exceed government and ASTM safety standards | Non-toxic paint is lead and phthalate safe
SIZE: Assembled dimensions: 34”W x 19.75”D x 34.25”H | Interior Drawer Size: 30.5”W x 13.5”D x 5.75”H | Easy assembly | Securely attach dresser to wall with included tipover restraint
body.description: The Essex 3 Drawer Dresser with Interlocking Drawers by Delta Children is a must-have storage unit for stylish parents and kids! Designed to elevate modern nurseries or bedrooms, it is the perfect accompaniment to your Essex 4-in-1 Crib with its angled feet and two-toned detailing. With three spacious drawers, this sturdy dresser provides a range of practical storage possibilities to suit all your needs. For your child’s safety, this dresser is outfitted with and interlocking drawer system that limits the number of drawers that can be opened at one time. Plus, it’s GREENGUARD Gold Certified, which means it’s built to contribute to cleaner air for a healthy home. Coordinates with other items in the Essex Nursery Furniture Collection by Delta Children.This Delta Children dresser is tested to meet the current requirements of ASTM F2057, the mandatory CPSC safety standard that protects young children from furniture tip-over incidents. For your children’s safety, only purchase dressers that comply with this standard. For additional security, Delta Children strongly recommends that all dressers in your home be anchored; all Delta dressers include a wall anchor. To learn how to properly secure your dresser, please see the product assembly instructions or visit our website.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this dresser. It is sturdy and well made. It takes time to assemble. The instructions provided were easy to follow. I have two of these dressers, one for my son and one for my daughter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don't buy - cheaply made
reviews.reviewText: Looks nice in photos and I wish it worked better. However, it's very cheaply made. The drawers are very difficult to open and close and are prone to jamming on the tracks. Several of the components came cracked and/or misaligned. Not worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid and cute!
reviews.reviewText: Love this dresser. Super good quality. There was some screws that weren't threaded right so I had to improvise which was a bummer and doesnt seem as solid in some spots as it could be, but I didnt want to return the whole thing Its Heavy!! The drawers are not soft close so watch your fingers they do get shut inside easily - prob not good for little fingers but we shall see. This is 100% worth the money and effort to put together. It really isnt hard just takes time and focus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is time consuming to put together
reviews.reviewText: We got this in last night and i will admit i was hesitant about purchasing because the reviews aren’t great. But please buy it if you or your partner or someone you know knows how to properly assemble things together. My partner spent over an hour and half assembling it together and he followed the steps and assembled the dresser from the inside out as directed. There are alot of pieces and may be overwhelming, but that’s why you need to take your time on it. It is very sturdy and heavy and one thing i do like about the dresser is that you can’t open another drawer if one is already opened and you need to use both hands to open the drawer so it’s definitely heavy and would be hard for a kid to pull on the drawers or tip over. So far i like it and i hope i will continue to like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars We got a dud
reviews.reviewText: My husband and I were trying to set this up and ended up with screw base that wasn’t deep enough for the screw and thus not sitting flush when screwing it in. It was difficult to screw it in at the angle it required (90 degrees) and when we tried to unscrew it, the whole base came out with the screw. We are very disappointed with this lack of quality control since we loved building our DC crib.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The drawers are a little bit sticky but other than that I have no issues. Looks just like the picture and it was easy to put together even at 7 months pregnant. It fits a lot and it’s the perfect size

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Delta Children Essex 3 Drawer Dresser is a fantastic storage solution. Its sturdy build, ample storage space, and modern design make it a reliable and stylish choice. The drawers glide smoothly, and the assembly is hassle-free. It offers great value for the price. Highly recommended for any room in need of extra storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Delta Children Essex 3 Drawer Dresser
reviews.reviewText: Great children dresserLooks great very well made
